snippet.title: Sonic Advance Revamped: New Intro and Title Screen!
snippet.description:
Take a look at the brand new, but still familiar, intro and title screen for Sonic Advance Revamped!! I've been working on this for a few weeks, and I'll happily explain how some of the more intriguing characters fit in to the final game. Feel free to ask me things in the comments!

UPDATE (8/17/21):
A clip from this in-game footage was featured in a recent Sonic Rings Series video on the official Sonic The Hedgehog YouTube channel, and they linked back to this video in their video's description thanks to incredible help from Katie (MiniKitty), Sonic's Social Media Manager!! Thank you so much!! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mH1-o-5O9fo

Try the latest Demo for Sonic Advance Revamped below, from Sonic Amateur Games Expo 2018! The game is still being worked on, progress is just slow. Thank you for understanding! (Available for Windows)

Download from Google Drive: 
https://drive.google.com/file/d/18k6yfKN2CP4jJB9YDjZPLbB-DKp9d_Fk/view?usp=sharing

Download from MEGA: 
https://mega.nz/#!hiRFwCQb!uDLWNWZOpgO-4-l-qw6ktfVQR6DZVUL9Q7b1Z_FUN84

SFGHQ Page Link:
https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/sonic-advance-revamped-demo-2-sage-2018.196/

Alternatively, here are some links to the very first short, but sweet, Demo for Sonic Advance Revamped below! Just keep in mind it's incredibly outdated by this point, and the game has come a long way since 2017! (Available for Windows and Mac)

Download from Google Drive: 
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/0B4K2vvukG6VlLW5hcEV3bkM3RkE?usp=sharing

Download from MEGA: 
https://mega.nz/#F!J7RmCIRZ!0AHy3qB-jvL43a2AXRNVNQ

If you'd like to stay up to date on Sonic Advance Revamped, please join the game's official Discord Server!

Sonic Revamped Discord Server Permanent Invite Link:
https://discord.gg/YqNHbA5

There is also a Sonic Advance Revamped Blog on Tumblr, but it isn't updated much at all anymore. Feel free to check it out nonetheless!
https://sonicadvancerevamped.tumblr.com/

Thank you so much for your continued support!!
